short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Inject Dark Theme To Any Website

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A universal dark theme for website.
Dark is an extension that helps you quickly turn the website to dark.
Allows users to set whether to apply a dark theme to any page.
Provide a master switch, you can turn off the dark theme at any time and return to the normal page
Alternatively, you can use the context-menu item in mouse right-click to set the settings.
Configuration files can also be exported and imported to share with friends.
